## ICanvas interface

A cross-environment interface for canvas objects that covers the properties and methods supported by both DOM (as HTMLCanvasElement) and canvas-cleave (as NodeCanvas).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICanvas 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.icanvas.height.md) | <code>number</code> | The height of the canvas. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.icanvas.width.md) | <code>number</code> | The width of the canvas. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getContext(context, options)](./canvas-cleave.icanvas.getcontext.md) | Get a 2D rendering context for the canvas. |
